title: Rams Take The Crown
description:
Laura, Mina, Marcus, and Dan breakdown the Super Bowl LVI matchup between the Rams and Bengals, highlight the dominance of the Rams defensive line, key news on the injury to Odell Beckham Jr., and paint an outlook for the Bengals after the loss.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
